ussr.robotbuildingblocks
Class AtronShape

java.lang.Object
  ussr.robotbuildingblocks.Description
      ussr.robotbuildingblocks.AtronShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
GeometryDescription
public class AtronShape
extends Description
implements GeometryDescription

A description of an ATRON half geometry, currently only includes a radius. TODO: Generalize into a CAD model?

Author:
Modualar Robots @ MMMI
